item.title: micro:bit Hardware Specifications
item.description: micro:bit is a System-On-Chip (SOC) development board powered by ARM core. The support for this development has been outstanding and beginer friendly. The board is slick with minimal design and compact for quick prototyping. If the above pic looks overwhelming, relax, we are going to decode the components that matter the most as a developer.
